bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard Specification Format Guide and Test Procedure for Linear, Single-Axis, Nongyroscopic Accelerometers Corrigenda 1: Annex K & L Changes (Revision of IEEE 1293-1998)
IEEE Draft Standard Specification Format Guide and Test Procedure for Linear, Single-Axis, Nongyroscopic Accelerometers Corrigenda 1: Annex K & L Changes (Revision of IEEE 1293-1998)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1293-1998/Cor1-2008_D3, May 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Specification and test requirements for Linear, Single-Axis, Nongyroscopic Accelerometers for use as a sensor in attitude control systems, linear displacement measuring systems, and linear rate measuring systems are defined. The specification format guide and test procedure standard applies to force-rebalance accelerometers (pendulous or translational proof mass), vibrating beam accelerometers (VBAs), and micromechanical accelerometers that range from lesser accuracy to high accuracy devices.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
